user_question: How can I create a viral marketing campaign for a new eco-friendly water bottle and generate an image of the campaign poster?
final_answer: To create a viral marketing campaign for an eco-friendly water bottle, focus on social media platforms with engaging content, collaborate with eco-influencers, and use hashtags like #EcoHydrate. Image of the campaign poster generated. Suggested slogan: 'Sip Sustainably, Live Responsibly.'
